page.title: 09BUCKNALL SCHOOL - SCHEMES
page.content: The{English}scheme is about nine years old but the books themselves are only three years old. {Sports}equipment is excellent and we try but sometimes fail to keep it in that condition. Mr Kirk is not stingey with the equipment and most playtimes lets us have some out as long as we ask him nicely and as long as long as we're in his good books! The{spelling}scheme is one of the best schemes in Britain and is only 2 years old. It is called Spelling Workshop and has different cards that are fairly hard and get harder the further you go on. Our {reading scheme}is wonderful as our teacher keeps reminding us. It has 15 levels and about 64 books in each level. Our{library}contains roughly 1400 factual books ranging from animals and birds and armoured cars to tanks.
